page.title: 09Housing & Housing Provision
page.content: Most of the housing in the area is to be found in the NE of the area. This consists of a number of local authority developments of differing ages plus some older "ribbon development" private housing and some pockets of new private housing. {PROVISION OF HOUSING { }In chronological order the various developments are: a) Ribbon Development on Strathaven Road (1920's on) b) Eddlewood, older part. Begun about 1938 - slum clearance. c) Fairhill 1950's/60's - slum clear- ance. d) Eddlewood, newer part. Ferniegair miners' rows demolished. e) Meikle Earnock - Woodhead - 1960's onwards. f) Brackenhill - Wimpey built early 1970's.
